title: Native American Concept
body:
I'm not creative enough to come up with ability names and lore, but I am hoping someone will like my concept and springboard it into a more concrete idea.

I think a champion based on Native Americans would be pretty cool. A sneaky, jungle champ who excels in hiding in bushes. Perhaps has a stealth when exiting bushes? Maybe a passive where the champ "gathers food" from the bushes, passively healing itself. 

I think the champ should be armed with a Tomahawk and Bow and Arrow. An ability to set a trap would be cool. Maybe his ult he turns into a wolf or raven for a while.

From what I've read, warriors from many tribes were experts at guerrilla warfare, excelling in the art of ambush attacks and tracking.

Kudos to anyone who can expand on this idea :)

replies.body: i want another black man. that is all!
